afk.example:
> *AFK Ka Istmal:*
- Set AFK: *afk [reason]*
- Example: *afk main busy hoon* Last seen #lastseen ago
- Message bhejne se AFK status automatically hat jata hai
- hatain AFK: *afk off*

alive.desc: *Apna koi bhi alive message update kar skty ho ğŸª*

antifake.example:
*Antifake Status:* {0}

> *Usage Examples:*
- *antifake list* - dekain country codes
- *antifake add 91,1* - Allow list mein country codes shamil karein
- *antifake remove 91,1* - Allow list se country codes hatayein
- *antifake on | off* - Enable/Disable antifake
antifake.not: *_Koi country codes list karne ke liye nahi hain_*
antifake.allow_prompt:
*Please provide country codes to allow (whitelist mode)*
_Example: antifake allow 1,91_
antifake.disallow_prompt:
*Please provide country codes to disallow (blacklist mode)*
_Example: antifake disallow 92,93_
antifake.remove_prompt:
*Please provide country codes to remove*
_Example: antifake remove 91_
antifake.mode_conflict_whitelist:
*âš ï¸ Cannot mix modes!*

_You are currently in Blacklist Mode. Use `antifake clear` first to switch to Whitelist Mode._
antifake.mode_conflict_blacklist:
*âš ï¸ Cannot mix modes!*

_You are currently in Whitelist Mode. Use `antifake clear` first to switch to Blacklist Mode._

antilink.antilink_notset: Antilink tamam links ko block karne ke liye configure hai (koi URL list set nahi hai). Mukhtasas URLs configure karne ke liye 'antilink allow' ya 'antilink disallow' istemal karein.
antilink.example:
Antilink Status: *{0}*

> Usage Examples:
- antilink list - dekahin current settings
- antilink allow whatsapp.com - Allow specific URLs
- antilink disallow facebook.com - Disallow specific URLs
- antilink clear allow - Clear allowed URLs
- antilink clear disallow - Clear disallowed URLs
- antilink on | off - Enable/Disable antilink
- antilink kick | warn | null - action set karain link ky liye
antilink.allow_prompt: *Kripya allow karne ke liye ek URL dain.*
antilink.no_new_urls: *Koi naye URLs add karne ke liye nahi hain.* Saare URLs pehle se list mein hain.
antilink.urls_updated:
*Allowed URLs update ho gaye*

Added: {0}
Total: {1} URL(s)

_Note: URLs case-insensitive hain_
antilink.disallow_prompt: *Kripya disallow karne ke liye ek URL dain.*
antilink.no_disallowed_urls: *Koi naye URLs disallow karne ke liye nahi hain.* Saare URLs pehle se disallowed hain.
antilink.disallowed_updated:
*Disallowed URLs update ho gaye*

Blocklist mein add kiya gaya: {0}
Total blocked: {1} URL(s)

_Note: URLs case-insensitive hain_

antiword.desc: *Group chat mein kuch khaas alfaaz ko filter karain.*
antiword.example:
AntiWord Status: {0}
> *Usage Examples:*
- antiword kick | warn | null - Violations ke liye action set karo
- antiword on | off - Enable/Disable word filtering
- antiword add word1,word2 - Block list mein alfaaz shamil karein
- antiword remove word1,word2 - Block list se alfaaz hatayein
- antiword list - Blocked alfaaz dekhein

groq.example:
*Misal:* groq Hi

Aap optional taur par neeche diye gaye environment variables set kar sakte hain:
- GROQ_API_KEY
- GROQ_MODEL
- GROQ_SYSTEM_MSG

Zyada maloomat ke liye, yeh link dekhein, visit: https://console.groq.com/keys

unmute.desc: _Group mein sab participants ko message bhejne ki ijaazat de._

join.invalid_link: _ek valid WhatsApp group invite link dein_
join.group_full: *_Group full hai aur naye members ko accept nahi kar sakta._*

revoke.not_admin: _Main admin nahi hoon, is liye invite link revoke nahi kar sakta_

common_members.desc: _Do ya zyada groups mein common members ko dikhayein ya kick karein._
common_members.common_usage:
*Example*
common jid
common jid kick
common jid1 jid2
common jid1,jid2 kick
common jid1 jid2 jid3...jid999

common jid1 jid2 jid3 any
kick - sirf us group se hatane ke liye jispe apne command di hai
kickall - saare groups se hatane ke liye
any - do ya zyada common group members include karne ke liye
skip - saare groups se hatane se bachne ke liye, example skip ek group se bachne ke liye ya skip jid1,jid2,jid3 in groups se bachne ke liye.

insta.desc: _Instagram posts, reels, aur videos download karein._

ison.desc: *_Check karein agar ek phone number Whatsapp par register hai._*

lydia.usage:
*istmal:* _lydia on | off
Reply or Reply ya mention karke kisi user ke liye activate karein._
lydia.note: _Yeh sirf reply message se kaam karega._
lydia.desc: _Chatbot feature ko on ya off karein_

rotate.not_found: _video par reply karein aur valid rotation direction (right, left, ya flip) specify karein._
rotate.desc: _Video ko right, left, ya flip karke rotate karein_

mp3.usage: _Video ya audio par reply karke ise MP3 mein convert karein._
mp3.not_found: _video ya audio message par reply karein._
mp3.desc: _Video ko audio ya audio clip ko voice note mein convert karein._

photo.usage: *_Sticker photo par reply karke ise image mein convert karein._*

reverse.usage: *_Video ya audio par reply karke uski playback ko reverse karein._*
reverse.not_found: *_video ya audio message par reply karein._*
reverse.desc: *_Video ya audio clip ki playback ko reverse karein._*

trim.not_found: _Please video par reply karein aur valid start aur duration values (misal: 60;30) dein._
trim.desc: _Video ko di gayi start aur duration times ke darmiyan trim karein._

page.not_found: *Please kisi tasveer par reply karein aur ek numeric caption dein jo page number dikhaye.*

pdf.desc: *_Images ko ek PDF document mein Tabdeel karein._*

merge.desc: _bhut se videos ko ek saath merge karein._

bass.desc: *_Audio file ke bass levels ko Tabdeel karein._*

pdm.desc: _Group mein promote/demote events ke liye automatic notifications enable ya disable karein._
pdm.not_found: _â€˜onâ€™ ya â€˜offâ€™ specify karein. Misaal: pdm on_

pinterest.not_found: _Koi media nahi mila. URL check karein aur dobara koshish karein._
pinterest.desc: _Pinterest se videos ya images download karein._

plugin.desc: _Gist URL de kar external plugins install karein ya sab installed plugins ki list dekhein_
plugin.not_installed: _Abhi tak koi plugins install nahi hain._

remove.desc: _External plugins ko unka naam likh kar delete karein ya sab plugins ek sath remove karein._
remove.removed: _Plugins kamiyabi se remove kar diye gaye._

reboot.desc: _Bot instance ko PM2 se dobara start karein._

fullpp.updated: _Profile picture update ho gayi hai âœ…_

jid.desc: _User ya chat ka JID return karta hai. Yeh mention kiye gaye user, reply message, ya phir default current chat ka JID check karega._

left.desc: *_Current group se leave karne ka command. Agar additional text diya jaye, toh leave hone se pehle wo send hoga._*

block.usage: *Misaal:* _block (reply karein ya kisi user ko mention karein)_

unblock.usage: *Misaal:* _unblock (reply karein ya kisi user ko mention karein)_

whois.name: *Name :* {0}
whois.desc: *_User ya group ka profile picture aur additional maloomat (e.g., about, status) dikhata hai._*

gjid.desc: *Sabhi groups ke JIDs aur unke names ki list dikhata hai.*

qr.usage: *Misaal:* *_qr test YA reply karein kisi QR image par qr likh kar_*
qr.desc: _Diye gaye text se QR code generate karein ya kisi replied QR code image ko decode karein._

reddit.desc: _Diye gaye Reddit post se video download karein._
reddit.error: _Diye gaye URL ke liye koi video nahi mila._

rmbg.desc: _Replied image ka background remove karein using remove.bg API_
rmbg.key: > Is command ko use karne ke liye remove.bg par sign up karein, apna account verify karein, API key copy karein, aur is tarah set karein: .setvar RMBG_KEY:<your_api_key> (e.g., .setvar RMBG_KEY:GWQ6jVy9MBpfYF9SnyG8jz8P). SIGNUP: https://accounts.kaleido.ai/users/sign_up | API KEY: https://www.remove.bg/dashboard#api-key
rmbg.error: _API key ya image missing hai. Apni API key set karein aur kisi image par reply karein._

setschedule.usage:
> Misaal :
- setschedule jid,min-hour-day-month (24-hour format me, day aur month optional hain)
- setschedule 91987654321@s.whatsapp.net, 9-9-13-8
- setschedule 91987654321@s.whatsapp.net, 0-10 (har roz 10 am par message bhejne ke liye)
- setschedule 91987654321@s.whatsapp.net, 0-10, once (sirf ek baar 10 am par message bhejne ke liye)
setschedule.desc: _Automatically message bhejne ke liye ek schedule set karein. Target JID(s) aur time provide karein (minutes-hour-day-month format me; day aur month optional hain). Jo message schedule karna ho, us par reply karein_
setschedule.invalid: _Invalid schedule format ya time. Example ko follow karein._
setschedule.no_reply: _Jo message schedule karna chahte hain, us par reply karein_

getschedule.desc: _Specified chat ke sabhi scheduled messages ko retrieve karein._

delschedule.desc: _Ek scheduled message ko delete karein target JID aur time specify karke, ya sabhi scheduled messages remove karein._

setstatus.desc: *_Specific contacts ya imported contacts ke liye WhatsApp status set karein. Kisi message (text, image, ya video) par reply karein taake status set ho sake._
setstatus.reply_required: _Status set karne ke liye kisi message par reply karein._

scstatus.usage:
> Misaal:
- scstatus jid,jid,jid,...|min-hour-day-month (day and month optional)
- scstatus contact|min-hour-day-month
- scstatus delete all|min-hour-day-month
- scstatus list
scstatus.desc: _Diye gaye time par WhatsApp status bhejne ke liye schedule karein. 'contact' ka use imported contacts ke liye karein ya specific JIDs provide karein._
scstatus.reply_required: *Status schedule karne ke liye kisi message par reply karein.*

antispam.desc: Manage antispam protection with configurable levels
antispam.disabled_status:
ğŸ“Š *Antispam Status*

ğŸ”´ Disabled

Use `antispam on` to enable protection
antispam.deactivated:
âš ï¸ *Antispam Protection Disabled*

Spam detection is now OFF
antispam.invalid_level: âŒ Invalid level. Use: low, medium, high
antispam.help:
ğŸ“– *Antispam Help*

*Commands:*
â€¢ `antispam on` - Enable (default: medium)
â€¢ `antispam off` - Disable
â€¢ `antispam <low/medium/high>` - Change sensitivity
â€¢ `antispam <warn/delete/kick>` - Change action
â€¢ `antispam info` - View current settings

*Levels:*
â€¢ Low - Relaxed (active groups)
â€¢ Medium - Balanced (recommended)
â€¢ High - Strict (problem groups)

sticker.desc: _Kisi image ya video ko sticker me convert karein. Sticker banane ke liye kisi image ya video message par reply karein._
sticker.reply_required: _Sticker banane ke liye kisi image ya video par reply karein._

circle.desc: _Kisi image ko circular sticker me convert karein._
circle.reply_required: *_Circular sticker banane ke liye kisi image par reply karein._*

take.usage: *Misaal:* _take <title,artists,url> (sticker ya audio par reply karein). Audio ke liye title zaroori hai; artists aur URL optional hain._
take.desc: _Sticker pack ka metadata update karein. Agar sticker par reply karein, to pack metadata update hoga. Agar audio par reply karein, to uska metadata (title, artists, URL) add hoga_
take.additional_info: _Audio metadata ke liye, artists ya URL optional hain._

mp4.desc: *_Animated sticker (WebP) ko MP4 video me convert karein._*
mp4.reply_required: *_MP4 me convert karne ke liye kisi animated sticker par reply karein._*

story.usage: *Misaal:* _story <username> (ya kisi message par reply karein jo username contain karta ho_*
story.desc: _Diye gaye username ke Instagram stories download karein. Agar multiple stories available hon, to ek list provide ki jayegi selection ke liye._
story.not_found: _Diye gaye username ke liye koi stories nahi mili._
story.list: _Total {0} stories available hain. Download karne ke liye ek select karein._

tag.usage: *Misaal:* _tag all | tag admin | tag notadmin | tag <custom message> (ya kisi message par 'tag' likh kar reply karein)._
tag.desc: _Group members ko tag karein apni pasand ke mutabiq. 'all' ka use sabhi members ko mention karne ke liye karein, 'admin' sirf group admins ko mention karega, 'notadmin' non-admin members ko mention karega, ya phir ek custom message bhejne ke liye apni message likhein_

tictactoe.usage:
*Misaal:* _tictactoe <opponent_jid> YA tictactoe normal <opponent_jid> YA tictactoe restart <opponent_jid> YA tictactoe end_
Default mode infinite hai, normal mode ke liye 'tictactoe normal' use karein.
tictactoe.desc: > TicTacToe game khelein kisi opponent ke against. Kisi user ko challenge karne ke liye unka mention karein, unke message par reply karein, ya unka JID specify karein. 'tictactoe end' game khatam karne ke liye use karein aur 'tictactoe restart <opponent_jid>' naye opponent ke sath game restart karne ke liye. Default mode infinite hai, normal mode ke liye 'tictactoe normal' use karein.
tictactoe.choose_opponent: _Kisi opponent ko choose karein message par reply karke ya user ko mention karke. Aap khud se nahi khel sakte._
tictactoe.game_restarted: _Game naye opponent ke sath restart ho gaya hai._
tictactoe.invalid_input: _Invalid input. Sahi opponent provide karein ya 'end' aur 'restart' ka sahi tareeke se use karein._

tiktok.usage: *Istmaal: _tiktok <TikTok URL> (ya kisi message par reply karein jo URL contain karta ho)_
tiktok.desc: _Diye gaye URL se TikTok video download karein_
tiktok.not_found: *_Koi video nahi mila. URL ko verify karein aur dobara koshish karein._*

tog.desc: _Kisi bot command ko enable ya disable karein._
tog.invalid: _Invalid input. Use: tog <command> on|off (e.g., tog ping off)_
tog.self_reference: _Kya aap waqai mujhe band karna chahte hain?_

trt.usage: *Misaal:* _trt ur hi YA trt ur (kisi text message par reply karein._
trt.desc: *_Google Translate ka use karke text translate karein. Target language code specify karein (aur optional source language code) jab reply karein._*

twitter.usage: *Misaal:* _twitter <Twitter URL> (ya kisi message par reply karein jo URL contain karta ho)_
twitter.desc: *_Twitter se video download karein. Agar multiple quality options available hon, to aapko choose karne ka option milega_*
twitter.not_found: _Diye gaye Twitter URL ke liye koi video nahi mila._

upload.usage: *_Example: upload <URL> (ya kisi message par reply karein jo URL contain karta ho)_*

url.usage: *Misaal:* _url OR url imgur (kisi image ya video par reply karein)_
url.desc: *_Kisi image ya video ko URL me convert karein. Agar chahein, to ek parameter (e.g., 'imgur') specify karein taake kisi specific service se URL mile._*

getvar.desc: _Kisi variable ki value dikhayein. Variable key (case-insensitive) provide karein taake uski value retrieve ho sake._

delvar.desc: _Variable ko delete karein uski key specify karke._

warn.usage: *Misaal:* _warn @user YA warn reset @user. Aap kisi user ke message par reply kar ke bhi 'warn' ya 'warn reset' likh sakte hain._

*Google Auth Ú©Ù…Ø§Ù†ÚˆØ²:*

- `.gauth auth` â€” ØªØµØ¯ÛŒÙ‚ Ú©Ø§ Ø¹Ù…Ù„ Ø´Ø±ÙˆØ¹ Ú©Ø±ÛŒÚºÛ”
- `.gauth code <url_or_code>` â€” ØªØµØ¯ÛŒÙ‚ÛŒ Ú©ÙˆÚˆ Ú©ÛŒ ØªÙˆØ«ÛŒÙ‚ Ú©Ø±ÛŒÚºÛ”
- `.gauth import` â€” `credentials.json` Ø§Ù…Ù¾ÙˆØ±Ù¹ Ú©Ø±ÛŒÚº (ÙØ§Ø¦Ù„ Ú©Ùˆ Ø¬ÙˆØ§Ø¨ Ø¯ÛŒÚº)Û”

*Ù†ÙˆÙ¹:* Ø¹Ø§Ù… YouTube ÙÛŒÚ†Ø±Ø² Ú©Û’ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ Google Auth Ø§Ø®ØªÛŒØ§Ø±ÛŒ ÛÛ’ Ù„ÛŒÚ©Ù† Ø¹Ù…Ø± Ú©ÛŒ Ù¾Ø§Ø¨Ù†Ø¯ÛŒ ÙˆØ§Ù„ÛŒ ÙˆÛŒÚˆÛŒÙˆØ² Ø§ÙˆØ± Google Drive/Ú©ÛŒÙ„Ù†ÚˆØ±/Ù¹Ø§Ø³Ú©Ø³ Ú©Û’ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ Ø¶Ø±ÙˆØ±ÛŒ ÛÛ’Û”
gauth.prompt:
*Google Authentication Setup Guide:*

1. *Project Banayein:* https://console.cloud.google.com/ par jayein, "Select a project" > "New Project" par click karein, naam "Levanter" rakhein aur "Create" karein.
2. *APIs Enable Karein:* "APIs & Services" > "Library" par jayein. "Google Drive API", "Google Calendar API" aur "Google Tasks API" search karke enable karein.
3. *OAuth Consent:* "APIs & Services" > "OAuth consent screen" par jayein. "External" chunein, zaroori fields bharein, aur "Audience" section mein "Test users" mein apna email add karein (ZAROORI).
4. *Credentials:* "APIs & Services" > "Credentials" par jayein. "Create Credentials" > "OAuth client ID" par click karein. "Desktop app" chunein, naam dein, aur "Create" karein.
5. *Download:* Apne naye Client ID ke paas Download (JSON) icon par click karein. Isse save karein aur file ko reply karke `.gauth import` ka istemal karein.
6. *Authorize:* Ab authorize karne ke liye neeche diye gaye link par click karein:
{0}

7. *Complete:* Login karein, "Unverified app" warning accept karein ("Advanced" > "Go to Levanter" par click karke), redirect ke baad address bar se pura URL copy karein, aur bhejein:
`.gauth code <copied_url>`
gauth.import_success: `credentials.json` kamyabi se import ho gaya! Ab authorize karne ke liye `.gauth auth` istimal karein.
gauth.import_reply: Baraye meharbani `credentials.json` file ko reply karein.
gauth.status_not_auth: *Status:* Session ke liye authenticated nahi hai. `.gauth auth` istimal karein.
gauth.logout: Session ke liye Google Auth data clear aur logout kar diya gaya.
